data.eml:eml: A new Schistura from the Salween basin in western Yunnan (Teleostei: Nemacheilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Endruweit, Marco (2017): A new Schistura from the Salween basin in western Yunnan (Teleostei: Nemacheilidae). Zootaxa 4243 (2): 394-400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4243.2.11
